title: Type information missing for argument of three function in package regexp
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
go1.7.1 - Not relevant


### What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
darwin/amd64 macOS Sierra 10.12.0 - Not relevant.


### What did you do?

Documentation on package regexp ( **https://golang.org/pkg/regexp/** )

func (re *Regexp) ReplaceAll(src, repl []byte) []byte
func (re *Regexp) ReplaceAllLiteral(src, repl []byte) []byte
func (re *Regexp) ReplaceAllLiteralString(src, repl string) string
func (re *Regexp) ReplaceAllString(src, repl string) string

### What did you expect to see?

The type for **src**, is it a string or an []byte?

### What did you see instead?

Argument type is missing.
